coreAtributes.name: Nerdy Glasses
coreAtributes.description: A pair of large blocky rectangular framed glasses with thick lenses.

displacementText.playerNPC: You put the glasses off. [npc.name]'s face.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You pull the glasses off [npc.name]'s face and give [npc.her] a bitch slap as a consolation prize.
displacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] puts the glasses off your face.
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] puts the glasses off your face and give you a rude gesture instead.

replacementText.playerNPC: You put the glasses on [npc.name]'s nose.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You slap [npc.name] on the face and carefully put the glasses on [npc.her] nose.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.name] puts the glasses on your face.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.name] gives you a harsh slap on the face and proceed with carefully putting the glasses on your nose.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.name] gives [npc2.name] a harsh slap on the face and proceed with carefully putting the glasses on [npc2.her] nose.
